participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys exploring emotions through writing and music.
participant_1.background: I remember listening to Yo Gotti with my brothers in the car on our way to the beach. I play the guitar because it is a good way to express myself and I enjoy the challenge of learning new songs. I am a writer that is also sensitive to people's reactions to my work. I love the outdoors and finding new ways to express myself. I love to go to the beach.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Energetic and humorous, enjoys connecting with others through music and laughter.
participant_2.background: I live on a farm with my mom who works in telecommunications. I am a musician. I have a marketing job. My favorite music is techno, it helps me get in the zone for my workouts. I am funny.

content.text: What's your favorite way to express yourself?
I like to play music, and write songs.
Cool, what kind of music do you play?
I'm a musician, I write and play techno music.
That's awesome! I love going to techno music festivals.
Me too, they're always so much fun!
Have you ever been to the Electric Daisy Carnival?
No, but I've heard great things about it.
It's one of the biggest techno music festivals in the world, it's definitely worth checking out.
I'll have to add it to my list!
You should! It's a lot of fun, and you'll meet some cool people.
I'm sure I will! I'm always looking to meet new people.
What do you like about writing songs?
I like being able to express myself creatively, and I love the challenge of writing a good song.
That's great! I love writing too. It's a great way to get your thoughts out and express yourself.
I agree! It's a great way to connect with your emotions and process them.
That's a great way to put it.
